summary:
3 plugin signal(s) indicate an issue affecting c.internal (https://c.internal/metadata).

Key evidence:
- [Galdr] Open redirect observed (MED)
- [Proxy] Captured authenticated flow (HIGH)
- [Seer] Server-side request forgery (CRIT)

proof.summary: Reproduce the issue on c.internal by following 2 synthesised steps.
steps:

- Plugin=proxy Severity=HIGH Message=Captured authenticated flow
- Plugin=seer Severity=CRIT Message=Server-side request forgery

Use at most 4 steps. Incorporate plugin observations:
- Galdr observed: Open redirect observed
- Proxy observed: Captured authenticated flow
- Seer observed: Server-side request forgery
Return concise imperative steps.
